description: John Frieda Volume Lift Conditioner gently detangles & nourishes without weighing hair down. Formulated with Air-Silk Technology, our lightweight formula provides softness without compromising your voluminous style, for hair that moves freely. Volume Lift products are safe for colour-treated hair and built to fight flat, fine hair. 1. FOR FINE OR FLAT HAIR - John Frieda Volume Lift Conditioner, with Air-silk technology, enhances fullness. 2. ENHANCES VOLUME IN 1 USE - Maximize the fullness of your hair with Volume Lift full style hair preparation. 3. FOR COLOUR-TREATED HAIR - Safe to use on colour-treated hair to fight limp hair. 4. SOFTENS HAIR - Volumizing conditioner leaves hair soft with touchable movement and bounce.
name: John Frieda Volume Lift Conditioner Conditioner 250ml
